name: School of Science and Technology, Singapore
motto: Learn for Life, Create to Serve
description: The School of Science and Technology, Singapore (SST) is Singapore's first specialised independent school that offers a distinctive applied learning programme. SST integrates Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Mathematics (STEAM) into its curriculum, nurturing future-ready students who are passionate about innovation and making a difference.
mission: To nurture passionate innovators who learn for life and create to serve, through a distinctive applied learning programme in science and technology.
vision: A world-class applied learning institution, inspiring innovation and empowering change-makers.

values.name: Compassion
values.description: Showing care and empathy for others

values.name: Excellence
